Container.Name: IMOIOWI
Container.Overview:
The "System Backup System" for UNRAID, Virtual Machines, Beginners and Experts.
- Backup - Create backups of your virtual machines automatically. When you want, where you want it, as often as you want.
- Restore - Rollback your systems easily and error free. Without specialized knowledge, simply at the touch of button.
- Choose - IMOIOWI has been optimized for mobiles. But it works just as well for tablets and desktops.
